Description:
Roomy Classic Ready for Rejuvenation
This double block-fronted Victorian has it all covered for those desiring space, period appeal, north-facing rear, excellent ROW and outstanding potential in a central village position. It's time to add your definitive touch to this charming 7-room home on 415 sqm (approx) and make a sublime statement in contemporary inner-city living close to cafes, shops, great schools, Clifton Hill station and extensive parklands and trails. Nestled behind a classic heritage facade and looking forward to stylish rejuvenation, this long-held home is filled with character including arched hallway, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, living room, lounge, sitting area, kitchen/meals, powder room, sheltered alfresco areas, open fireplaces, high ceiling roses and massive garage.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY AT 11.00 AM VIEW 10.45 AM
A quality restoration has melded the contemporary with the period to create the perfect inner city home only a stroll from the station, the Village shops and situated in the wider renowned period streetscape of O’Grady St.
Positioned on a compact allotment with a small rear courtyard this quality abode has three bedrooms with robes, a large central lounge that opens to the new timber family kitchen with adjoining meals area and sparkling bathroom.
Combining period mantles, arches, mouldings high ceilings and fittings with richly polished hardwood floors, neutral tones and ducted heating and cooling facilities.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL VALUE TERRACE!!
Contemporary flair and period character are superbly fused in this elegant balcony terrace, close to Queens Parade, Brunswick St and the Edinburgh Gardens. Elevated from the street and distinguished by a tall iron-pillared verandah, the house opens into an arched Baltic floored hallway leading to a handsome bedroom with marble overmantel and ornate plasterwork, then to an expansive living and dining room with a wall of glass to a private landscaped courtyard with access to Council Street. Set to one side of the living area is the stylish kitchen, fitted with premium German appliances, quality cabinetry and marble benchtops, flowing to an elegant bathroom/concealed laundry. Japanned timber stairs ascend from the living room to the beautifully-proportioned balcony bedroom, second luxury bathroom and the third bedroom, which has access to a stunning balcony garden designed for year-round al fresco living. Features of this exceptional property include extensive bespoke storage, gas infloor heating, reverse-cycle airconditioning, quality appointments and ornate period detail.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
The Luxury of Land
This freestanding 3 bedroom Edwardian home in a highly prized locale represents a clean slate opportunity to renovate or re develop (STCA) into something truly special.
Situated moments away from The Quarries Park, Ramsden Street Reserve, Public Transport, The Yarra River and Bike Trails, this generous northern oriented allotment of 9.7 x 50.3 m or 487 square metres approximately, has the added bonus of rear car access via ROW.
Complementing the expansive land component is a home characterised by lofty ceilings, period detail and enormous potential.
Enjoy the lifestyle of this premiere city fringe location and the vast array of amenities on offer.
Agent in Conjunction: http://doubledayrealestrate.com.au
Sasha Romensky : 0401 903 144

Located near cafes, shops, trails and train station, this ideal inner city apartment will encapsulate your city living needs.

Description:
Charming & Affordable Brick Victorian
Situated in a quiet neighbourly street, with the ideal floor plan, this home presents a fabulous buying opportunity!
- 2 spacious bedrooms - built in robe, feature fire place
- Warm and inviting living and dining area - polished floor boards
- Functional gas kitchen - dishwasher
- French doors open to a peaceful and private low maintenance courtyard garden
- Modern central bathroom - bath; Concealed laundry
- Ducted heating and cooling; Roof storage
- Period features; High ceilings
- Land 5 x 23m approx
- Popular Victorian terrace row
- Move straight in with scope to add value when desired
Lifestyle position with Clifton Hill and Smith St cafes & shopping strip, Edinburgh Gardens, transport & CBD moments away.

Description:
CHECK OUT THE SPACE!
This well designed townhouse has the strong appeal of extra-spacious rooms, a functional floor plan, and a prime location moments from Clifton Hill Village and station, the Darling Gardens and schools. Filled with natural light, it comprises an expansive living and dining room flowing to a large al fresco entertaining area, kitchen with quality appliances and pantry, two generously-proportioned bedrooms (main with balcony) and a 2-way bathroom/concealed laundry. Including a lock-up car space, this appealing residence with CBD views features high ceilings, generous storage throughout, ducted heating, air conditioning and intercom entry.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
LIGHT-FILLED LUXURY WITH A PERFECT PARKLAND LOCATION!
In a sublime city-edge location directly opposite parklands & moments from Merri Creek/Yarra River parks & trails, this stunning family sized semi-detached town residence has been recently renovated throughout to provide a spacious contemporary living environment for growing families, busy professionals and/or high-end investors alike. Bathed in natural light, the home's vogue interior boasts wonderful parkland & tree top outlooks with a versatile layout that incorporates two large upstairs bedrooms and modern two-way central bathroom, plus a huge top-floor master bedroom suite with retreat/study, private ensuite and fabulous park views. Downstairs: a spacious open-design living and dining zones are complemented with a central gourmet kitchen & breakfast bar with quality appliances - all leading to a private courtyard with undercover decked entertaining area and a double carport (remote) providing easy car access from the rear lane. Extensive highlights include ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm system, stone benchtops and vanities, polished hardwood floors, robes in all bedrooms, separate laundry/powder room and security shutters. Please Note - NO Body Corporate.
A quality inner residence in a prime residential location! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Classic Character, Perfect Proportions, Rich Rewards
Superbly elevated well back from the street; the quiet ambience and classical appeal of this double-fronted Hawthorn brick Victorian provides perfect inspiration for future success in a central inner-city location. Excellent rear ROW via wide paved laneway further enhances this outstanding opportunity to immediately enjoy the three large bedroom layout with entertainers' kitchen (DeLonghi stove, integrated drawer dishwasher and eat-in dining) and further improve when ready (STCA). Seconds to schools, Darling Gardens, Queens Parade and Brunswick Street, this well-proportioned heritage home includes arched hallway, bedrooms with built-in-robes, living room, bathroom, laundry, Nobo heating, air-conditioner, open fireplaces, polished floorboards, period ceilings, courtyard garden with covered alfresco area and garage.
Belinda Lindsay : 0409 853 769

Description:
GREAT INVESTMENT OR LUXURIOUS HOME!
A combination of top end design and build quality will ensure that this near new town residence will satisfy even the most picky of buyers. Over three levels the home boasts 3 double bedrooms (2x BIR), 3 bathrooms, garage with plenty of storage, Euro laundry, huge lounge and dining zones with central kitchen boasting Caesar stone bench tops, glass splashbacks, dual pantry, Miele appliances and there's an entertainers balcony's at either end of the residence. A tribute to modern design with plenty of natural sunlight, street frontage to Stan St, air conditioning and more plus it's all moments from the Yarra River, surrounding parklands, freeway access, trains and Spensley Street shops. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Incomparable Quality, Inner-City Convenience
Outstanding contemporary quality extends throughout this amazingly spacious top floor, two-level townhouse style apartment with vibrant inner-city living at the doorstep. A streamlined, light-filled design with quality appointments and high ceilings is tailored for a carefree low-maintenance environment in a secure, boutique complex delivering the utmost privacy with a stylish, peaceful ambience. Features include two robed bedrooms (huge main with study alcove) with central bathroom with bath, superb open plan living and dining spilling onto covered balcony with stunning tree-top views, excellent kitchen, separate powder room and laundry, light-filled study area, double-glazing, heating/cooling and secure intercom entry. Basement car space and storage cage, plus exceptional storage throughout are a reassuring accompaniment for occupiers and investors in a convenient village location near Queens Parade cafes, Darling Gardens, recreation centre and train station.
Julie Susnjara : 0408 006 662

Description:
FEDERATION CHARM AND SPACE
A versatile three/four bedroom floor plan, large rooms and a prime address close to Village cafes, parkland and transport give this welcoming period residence very special appeal. In comfortable, well-maintained condition yet offering scope for further renovation and extension (STCA), here is a light-filled home awaiting a new family. Entered from a wide verandah, the house opens to an impressively long return hallway with fretwork arch, from which run a handsomely proportioned formal sitting room with marble open fireplace, three bedrooms, a tiled bathroom and full-size laundry. To the rear are a large dining room, second living area (potential 4th bedroom) and a neat kitchen with stainless steel 5-burner range. A verandah overlooks the deep courtyard, with bungalow/workshop, WC and car access. Features of this charming property include polished Baltic floors, leadlighting, ornate plasterwork and gas heating. Land size: 306sqm approx.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
PERIOD CHARM MEETS CONTEMPORARY STYLE!
A perfect choice for professionals and blue-chip investors, this extended single-front Edwardian home offers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with the best of Clifton Hill at your fingertips. Inviting interior highlights two double bedrooms (both with BIRs) and contemporary-style central bathroom, light-filled open-plan living/dining area complete with vaulted ceilings and polished hardwood floors, adjoining kitchen with dishwasher, plus gas heating and concealed laundry facilities. Step outside to a delightful north-facing courtyard with undercover deck, established gardens and ROW access. Description:
FEDERATION BEAUTY OPPOSITE PARKLANDS!
Set on a deep garden allotment (13m x 49m approx) with Merri Creek parks and Capital City Trail virtually at your doorstep, this attractive double fronted period home is ready to move in and enjoy, providing an idyllic family lifestyle opportunity with potential to further extend (STCA) taking advantage of the deep block and the premiere residential location. Beyond its striking facade, the home's free-flowing single-level living environment offers generous proportions with a wide central hallway accessing three large bedrooms (open fireplaces and exquisite lead-light windows), period-inspired central bathroom complete with clawfoot bath, spacious family living room, quality kitchen with stainless steel bench tops and an adjoining dining area opening onto an impressively deep west-facing backyard garden with decked entertaining area, double gates to ROW plus a self-contained studio/bungalow (guest/additional bedroom) complete with kitchenette and bathroom. Extensive features include hydronic heating throughout, alarm system, polished timber floors, high ornate ceilings & European laundry. A rare opportunity in this tightly-held park side location close to Spensley Street Primary School, Quarries Park, local cafes, Queens Parade shops and eateries. A wonderful long term family opportunity! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
IDYLLIC CITY-EDGE LIVING!
Metres from Yarra Bend parkland and trails in one of inner-Melbourne's favourite pockets, this contemporary 3BR residence delivers a perfect blend of light, space, style and convenience. Light and bright, the home's inviting interior features two large upstairs bedrooms and two-way central bathroom, plus a huge top-floor master bedroom complete with vaulted ceilings, study alcove and modern ensuite. Downstairs: spacious open-design separate lounge and living/dining areas complemented by well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances. Extensive highlights include gas heating and split-system a/c (four units), stylish Red Ironwood flooring, separate laundry/powder room, excellent storage throughout (including attic), as well as a delightful north-facing entertainers' courtyard with established gardens, garage/workshop (remote) to ROW. Please note, this property is not part of an Owners Corporation.

Description:
Idyllic Location... Outstanding Apartment...
Within the delightful environs of Clifton Hill only a stroll to Queens Parade’s diverse eateries and specialties stores this beautifully renovated apartment opposite Darling Gardens may just be that city abode you’ve been searching so long for!
At the rear of this well maintained block of 12 that features security intercom entry, off street parking and private balconies, this first level apartment has been extensively renovated by the current owner and would certainly make an ideal inner city pad to live & enjoy or outstanding investment assured of an excellent rental return and future capital growth.
Comprising 2 very spacious bedrooms with built in robes, gorgeous kitchen with Blanco appliances & dishwasher, L-shape lounge/dining with access to balcony, chic bathroom with shower over bath, European laundry, formal entry and quality fittings/fixtures throughout... Exceptional!
Insights: 10/15 South Terrace, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
SINGLE FRONT, DOUBLE BLOCK!
A short stroll to Dights Falls and Yarra River parks, this freestanding solid-brick Edwardian on a wide block of land (approx 10m frontage) presents an amazing inner-city lifestyle opportunity. Spacious and well-appointed, the home's expanded floorplan comprises two large bedrooms (master with BIRs) and modern bathroom, wide central lounge opening out to a side courtyard with water feature, open-plan living/dining area and updated kitchen with marble bench, dishwasher and stainless steel cooking appliances. Other features of the home include ducted heating throughout, alarm system, high ornate ceilings and polished timber floors, gated off-street parking, plus an expansive backyard with brick-paved entertaining area and established gardens. A unique opportunity in one of inner-Melbourne's favourite pockets!
Insights: 21 Gray Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
PERIOD ELEGANCE, DOUBLE BLOCK
This handsome block-fronted Victorian residence, extensively renovated in understated contemporary style, embodies all the attractions of Clifton Hill living. Close to Village cafes, the station, schools and Yarra parkland, here is a light-filled house surrounded by tranquil courtyard gardens on an elevated double block (305 sq.m. approx). Entry from the deep front verandah is to a wide hallway floored in recycled blackbutt. Opening from the hall are a large bedroom-presently configured as a study -- the main bedroom, with a stylish ensuite bathroom and two walls of built-in wardrobes, and the superbly proportioned living and dining room, complete with working open fire. All principal rooms feature graceful French doors from the original Members' Pavilion at Flemington Racecourse. The kitchen, filled with light from a tall atrium flowing to the back garden, is fitted with a fine array of cabinetry, Carrara marble benchtops and premium appliances. A hallway links the living room with a tiled powder room, a third double bedroom and a large bathroom/laundry with sunken bath and overbath shower. Designed with several secluded outdoor living zones enhanced by mature plantings and bluestone paving, this captivating home features excellent period detail, very generous storage space, ducted heating and refrigerated cooling.
Insights: 41 Dwyer Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovation Opportunity in Outstanding Location...
This is a must see. A solid two-storey brick terrace offers a rare opportunity for the astute buyer to establish themselves in arguably the best street in this much sought after suburb. The residence has great potential as a family home and with some cosmetic works attended to could be made comfortable for owner-occupation or leasing whilst you contemplate future renovation and/or extension.
Your efforts will be well rewarded as the terrace is located within one of the area’s most envied pockets offering a multitude of enticing features including being only a few minutes stroll to the Clifton Hill ‘village’, train station, highly regarded schools and delightful Yarra parkland. The home also enjoys a sizeable allotment of approximately 175sqm, a rear northerly aspect, excellent off-street parking through the rear access from Little Walker Street, city views from the upstairs balcony and a flexible floor plan that accommodates 3 bedrooms.
Insights: 18 Walker Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
PERIOD GRACE, PRIME POSITION
FORTHCOMING AUCTION UNLESS SOLD PRIOR
This superbly maintained balcony terrace combines period warmth with modern comfort on the Clifton Hill-Fitzroy border, close to Brunswick Street, Queens Parade, the Edinburgh Gardens and schools. Elevated from the street, the house, featuring a tall pediment and lace-trimmed verandah, is immediately appealing. Entry is to an arched hallway, opening to a handsome formal sitting room (potentially a fourth bedroom) with wood-burning open fireplace and a view of the well-planted front garden. A large central formal dining room with study alcove leads back to a neat kitchen and a porch opening to the deep brick-paved courtyard garden (pedestrian ROW access), which houses a full-size laundry, storage shed and WC. Timber stairs lead up to the vast main bedroom, two further bedrooms, and a period-style bathroom. This inviting residence features hydronic heating, generous storage, and ornate period detail. Don't miss it!
Insights: 5 Hodgkinson Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.
